attributes.action: A united offensive on North Korea
attributes.additional_details: Kim Jong - Un and his henchmen are threatening the world with war. Let us unite with our allies and initiate a full blown offensive, joining the forces of Britain, America, China, South Korea, Japan and Russia in order to restore to democracy to a region fuelled by aggression and insanity. We propose the government begin talks with the nations mentioned above in order to ensure that North Korea's evil regime is removed, before we all suffer from the horrors of nuclear annihilation.
